item.title: Openstack - OVN - Provider Network
item.description: Concept # https://ubuntu.com/blog/data-centre-networking-what-is-ovn OVN manages the Northbound and Southbound DB, playing a crucial role in network orchestration: Northbound DB Functions as a public API service, facilitating interactions with external services, such as the OpenStack API.
